Our brand voice is bold, futuristic, and uses high‑tech jargon. Opening (0‑10s):
[Fast‑cut montage of alien planets, dense forests, and towering cities. A soaring synth soundtrack builds.] 
Narrator (deep, bold): “Welcome to the future of immersion.”

Hook (10‑20s):
[Close‑up of a young gamer gripping the Nebula Vision headset. The view expands to a 200° panoramic horizon.] 
On‑screen text: “200° Field of View.”
Narrator: “Step into worlds without limits.”

Feature Burst (20‑45s):
- Ultra‑Low Latency (<5ms): [Side‑by‑side gameplay – one side with lag, the other instant response.] 
  Narrator: “Feel the action in real time.”
- Adaptive Haptic Feedback: [Player flinches as an in‑game explosion reverberates through the hands.] 
  Narrator: “Every blast, every footstep, you’ll sense it.”
- Inside‑Out 6‑DOF Tracking: [Smooth, uninterrupted movement across a sprawling canyon.] 
  Narrator: “Move freely, stay tracked.”

Experience Story (45‑70s):
[Our gamer‑explorer traverses an exotic alien landscape, scaling cliffs, gliding over waterfalls, all rendered in hyper‑real detail.] 
Narrator: “Adventure without motion‑sickness. Dive deep, stay comfortable.”

[Hero shot of Nebula Vision floating against a starfield. Logo pulses.] 
Narrator: “Nebula Vision – See the universe without limits.”
On‑screen: “Pre‑order now at NebulaVR.com – 10% off for the first 1,000 customers.”

[Music crescendos and fades.]
